Australia are confident that vice-captain Alyssa Healy will be fit to return for Thursday's cut-throat semi-final at the ICC Women's T20 World Cup.

articles.title: Lionel Messi wanted 6 people out of Barcelona including player who betrayed his father if he were to remain at Camp Nou: Reports - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Before leaving for Paris Saint-Germain (PSG), Lionel Messi and his father Jorge - who also acted as his agent - gave an ultimatum to Barcelona president Joan Laporta.
